Media artist

email me
dm me

A media artist is someone who creates art using digital technology, multimedia, and various forms of electronic media. This can include video, sound, interactive installations, and digital imagery.

about me

I'm an artist from Argentina. I'm currently studying film direction at the University of Cinema of Buenos Aires (UCINE). I love painting, drawing, and creating digital art: I enjoy exploring new technologies and experimenting with different mediums, I'm always looking for new ways to express myself and push the boundaries of what's possible with different tools. to me a computer cursor is the same as a paintbrush. kinda.
